sentences.en: After months of enquiry we finally discovered the truth.
sentences.cn: 经过几个月调查,我们最后发现了真相.

sentences.en: Although the key result turned out negative, the researchers concluded that there is reason to pursue this line of enquiry further.
sentences.cn: 虽然，关键的结果是消极的，研究人员得出结论，认为他们有理由要作进一步的追求，继续探索的路线。

sentences.en: An enquiry she thought was a waste of resources.
sentences.cn: 她认为调查是浪费财力.

sentences.en: Cabin crew have been giving evidence at the M1 aircrash enquiry.
sentences.cn: 机舱人员一直在为M1空难调查作证。

sentences.en: Det Supt Bassett was in charge of the murder enquiry.
sentences.cn: 探长巴西特负责调查该谋杀案。

sentences.en: I don’t know who sent the gift, but I’ll make some enquiries.
sentences.cn: 我不知道礼物是谁送的，但我会打听一下。

sentences.en: I want to make an enquiry about train times.
sentences.cn: 我想打听一下火车的时刻.

sentences.en: I was referred to the manager / the enquiry office.
sentences.cn: 人家叫我去找经理[去问讯处].

sentences.en: She has taken my enquiry as a personal affront.
sentences.cn: 她将我的询问当成了人身侮辱。

sentences.en: Thank you for your enquiry / enquiries about my health.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你问候我的健康情况.

sentences.en: The police have eliminated two suspects  from their enquiry.
sentences.cn: 警方从调查中已排除了两名受嫌疑的人。

sentences.en: The police have eliminated two suspects ( from their enquiry ).
sentences.cn: 警方 ( 从调查中 ) 已排除了两名受嫌疑的人.

sentences.en: They could be tracked down by enquiry , they could be squeezed out of you by torture.
sentences.cn: 他们可以通过讯问, 可以通过拷打弄清楚.

sentences.en: They followed this line of enquiry because another property of self-organised criticality is that each event, on average, triggers only one other.
sentences.cn: 他们选用这种方式进行探究是因为自我组织临界的另一个特性是：平均来说，每一次触发都是一个接一个的。

sentences.en: They referred me to the Enquiry Office.
sentences.cn: 他们让我到问事处去问.

sentences.en: Various malpractices by police officers were brought to light by the enquiry.
sentences.cn: 警察的各种不法行为经调查已揭露出来.

sentences.en: We are forced to admit the impossibility of further enquiry.
sentences.cn: 我们被迫承认不可能进一步探索.

sentences.en: We are pleased to receive your enquiry.
sentences.cn: 我们很高兴收到您的询问函。

sentences.en: We’re getting a lot of enquiries about our new London-Rio service.
sentences.cn: 许多人来打听我们新开设的伦敦－里约热内卢的航班情况。

sentences.en: What was the result of the enquiry?
sentences.cn: 调查的结果如何?

sentences.en: When fresh supplies come into the market, we can revert to your enquiry.
sentences.cn: 等新货上市时，我们才能回头考虑你们的询盘。

trans.tran_en: a question you ask in order to get information
